solution_line_template: Mary fed Luna {mary_morning}+{mary_evening}={mary_total} cups of kibble.
Frank fed Luna {frank_afternoon}-cup plus twice {frank_afternoon}-cup, or {frank_afternoon}+{frank_late_evening_multiplier}={frank_total} cups of kibble.
In total, they fed Luna {mary_total}+{frank_total}=<<{mary_total}+{frank_total}={total_fed}>>{total_fed} cups of kibble.
Thus, if the new bag held {bag_start} cups of kibble, the next morning, {bag_start}-{total_fed}=<<{bag_start}-{total_fed}={cups_remaining}>>{cups_remaining} cups of kibble remained in the bag.
